creator: i@marguerite.su
text:
Created attachment 32941
patch to build with lua 5.2+

Hi, 

openSUSE use this patch to build apache2 with lua 5.3 and it builds smoothly, please review and consider merging it upstream :-)

Marguerite

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
I applied a variant of this patch to httpd trunk and backported it to 2.4.x in r1800835.

It will be part of version 2.4.27.

It would be nice if you could verify the fix either from the current 2.4.x head or during the release vote with the 2.4.27 candidate or after the release of 2.4.27.
